question: I'm a ftm. Going in to the hospital to be admitted. My doctor is trying to settle on whether induction or a c-section is what's best. I have high amniotic fluid and my baby's big. I have gestational diabetes and it didn't show in my test until now. Wish me luck mommies! I'm very scared
title: 39 week induction or c-section! Wish me luck
